svt_axi_ace_master_nonshareable_store_barrier_load_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_ace_master_nonshareable_store_barrier_load_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This sequence does the following: Sends a number of pre barrier write transactions based on num_pre_barrier_stores Sends a barrier pair Sends post barrier read transaction to the same address. Since the reads are post barrier transactions, all the previous writes should be observable to the reads All write transactions sends are WRITENOSNOOP transaction and read transactions are READNOSNOOP transactions

Member Constraint Documentation

  constraint
 svt_axi_ace_master_nonshareable_store_barrier_load_sequence::reasonable_num_ports

constraint reasonable_num_ports {
    num_ports inside {[1:(ace_ports.size()+ace_lite_ports.size()-1)]};
  }

  constraint
 svt_axi_ace_master_nonshareable_store_barrier_load_sequence::reasonable_num_pre_barrier_xacts

Greater weightage for sending only one pre barrier xact because there is a greater possibility of things going wrong there
constraint reasonable_num_pre_barrier_xacts {
    num_pre_barrier_stores dist {
      1 := 50,[2:10] := 50
    };
  }

  constraint
 svt_axi_ace_master_nonshareable_store_barrier_load_sequence::valid_domain_type

constraint valid_domain_type {
    domain_type inside {svt_axi_transaction::NONSHAREABLE};
  }
